note:
Accidental eschatologist. Studying sociology & information systems related to disinfo & conspiracy theories, internet movements/cultures, nuclear weapons, cults, political violence, war & terror studies, Russia/Eastern Europe studies, International Relations.   
Animal lover, big fan of the Golden Ratio dogs & #Uglydogs communities. May post about chronic illness, disability, art/graphics (traditional, mixed media, digital, photography) & offline life.

I probably need a nap.

fields.name: Bio:
fields.value: Erstwhile burnout multimedia artist. Lapsed Pacifist. Antifascist.
